TEXT: The remaining soldier of the Ironclads. NL Sold his soul to harness demonic energies.

Navigating an unlit street, you come across several hooded figures in the midst of some dark ritual. As you approach, they turn to you in eerie unison. The tallest among them bares fanged teeth and extends a long, pale hand towards you. NL ~"Join~ ~us~ ~brother,~ ~and~ ~feel~ ~the~ ~warmth~ ~of~ ~the~ ~Spire."~
A deadly huntress from the foglands. NL Eradicates foes with daggers and poisons.

This project was hastily thrown together for the purpose of playtesting the board game, specifically in order to judge the relative difficulty of each encounter in a single-player game. The mod remains very much a work in progress. You may notice missing content, rule inaccuracies, bugs, and even softlocks. Ascension Mode is not yet implemented. NL NL Most importantly, #ysave #yfiles #yare #ynot #yready #yyet.  If you try to save the game and reload, everything will break in hilarious and horrifying ways.
If the game softlocks on a reward screen, try opening and closing the map.

I used to be like you.

TEXT: Cards may not behave exactly as you remember.  Read them carefully.
The Die determines the behavior of certain relics and enemies.
Many relics will not take effect until you right-click them. Don't forget them!
When you roll a 6, you can trigger ANY die ability, but you must do so before playing a card.
Relics which let you reroll the die can also be used in events.
Some enemies can deal more damage than you have maximum health.
Max Energy is 6, max Strength is 8, and max Block is 20.
You can only add one copy of each Uncommon or Rare card to your deck.
Sometimes, card rewards will contain two copies of a Common card.
Monsters who seem unusually talkative may be planning to inflict you with Vulnerable.
Cards which cost "X" can be played for any amount of Energy, including 0.
Take a break every now and then.
When you Exhaust a Status card, it disappears instead of going into your Exhaust pile.
You will never see the same rare card twice in one run.
There is no maximum hand size.
Curses cannot be transformed. (Editor's note: for now, use the honor system.)
Unknown rooms contain only events until Ascension 3.
The card removal service does not increase in price each time you use it. Ignore that tooltip.
Some cards, relics, and events gain additional effects in multiplayer games.
OPTIONS: You can discard potions to make room for others.
